## Hello and Welcome!

I'm Jenni Shearston, and I'm an environemental epidemiologist with an interest in social justice, surveillance, and developing environmental measures. I've worked on numerous projects in the United States and abroad, ranging from work measuring Volatile organic compound emissions from gas stations to developing an app to help Russian and US college students quit smoking.
